venue.phone: Please Send Me A Message on Meet
venue.name: Davis Square

item.description:
Honk! Fest returns from Thursday October 4 thru Monday October 8.

For more information and updates http://honkfest.org 

March with the paradefrom Davis Square or meet in Harvard Square. Bring Your Camera. On Sunday, October 7 from Noon to 2pm over 30 activist street bands from around the country and beyond, will leave Davis Square and arrive at the Harvard Square Oktoberfest at 1pm to "reclaim the streets for horns, bikes and feet." The Grand Parade Marshall will welcome more than 30 marching bands and rolling, strolling, biking, dancing, performing and walking groups at the reviewing stand from 1-2pm. There will also be live entertainment, restaurant vendors, outdoor beer gardens, street vendors and Honk! bands from around the country performing on stages in Harvard Square. More information, schedules and updates will be available at www.honkfest.org [url=www.honkfest.org][/url] along with www.harvardsquare.com [url=www.harvardsquare.com][/url]

I can not properly describe the Honk! Parade. You must go to their web site for more information. It's a long day. Arrive early for the parade from Davis Square, later or in the middle of the Harvard Square mayhem. I will be attending the Honk! Parade with some friends as I have since its birth. We will be taking a break for lunch in the heart of Harvard Square. 

 **Please note the Honk! Parade begins in Davis Square, Somerville and ends at the Annual Oktoberfest celebration in Harvard Square, Cambridge.**

 Those who want to meetup should e mail other attending Natives to meet along the route.
item.name: Honk! Parade from Davis Sq to Oktoberfest Harvard Sq
